# Welcome

Welcome to my website. I am a PhD candidate in the 
[Department of Applied Economics](https://apec.umn.edu/) at the
[University of Minnesota](https://www.umn.edu). My advisor is
[Marc Bellemare](http://marcfbellemare.com/). My fields
are labor economics and agricultural development and I have a PhD 
minor in GIScience.
